q1: How does PDF to Excel conversion work?
a1: The tool extracts text from each PDF page with position data, then uses coordinate-based heuristics to detect rows and columns to reconstruct the table structure into an Excel spreadsheet.
a2: XLSX (Excel 2007+) and XLS (legacy Excel) files are supported. Multi-sheet workbooks will include all sheets when converting to PDF.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
